watchlists.Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
watchlists.Actors: Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Alan Rickman, Daniel Radcliffe
watchlists.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 45 wins & 91 nominations.
watchlists.Plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

watchlists.Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
watchlists.Actors: Richard Harris, Maggie Smith, Robbie Coltrane, Saunders Triplets
watchlists.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 17 wins & 62 nominations.
watchlists.Plot: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

watchlists.Title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
watchlists.Actors: Eric Sykes, Timothy Spall, David Tennant, Daniel Radcliffe
watchlists.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 13 wins & 42 nominations.
watchlists.Plot: A young wizard finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

watchlists.Title: Top Gun
watchlists.Actors: Tom Cruise, Kelly McGillis, Val Kilmer, Anthony Edwards
watchlists.Plot: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.
watchlists.Writer: Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr., Ehud Yonay (magazine article "Top Guns")
